alert.note: Alert for Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 2:08PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila County through 245 PM MST... At 208 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles west of Hilltop, or 20 miles north of Globe, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Gila County. This includes US Highway 60 between mile markers 258 and 281. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
